nodes.text: The Stargazer Grill Restaurant was a restaurant located on Level F on one of the wings of Spaceport THX1138. Its motto was "You can enjoy dishes being surrounded by stars." Meals and drinks included on its menu were Agamar sliders, Endorian chicken, Blue milk, Calamaria Surprise, Nerf steak, Roast Galma, Lambro shark, and Berbersian crab.
